thread.title: Valencia Farmer's mom praises cop's dogged pursuit of rapists, murderers
thread.title_full: Valencia Farmer's mom praises cop's dogged pursuit of rapists, murderers | News24

author: news24.com
title: Valencia Farmer's mom praises cop's dogged pursuit of rapists, murderers
text:
Cape Town - Sylvia Farmer believes that the promise made to her 16 years ago by the officer investigating her daughter's murder will bring all those responsible to justice.
"I trust him," she said at the Blue Downs Magistrate's Court, where Elmario Maasdorp appeared in the dock for his alleged role in the vicious murder of 14-year-old Valencia Farmer.
"Lieutenant Colonel Eddie Clark told me he would not give up and he would get every last one of them. And here we are today, all these years later."
Farmer speaks of Clark with fondness.
